pages.text: $(li)The Nether Wastes is a barren biome composed of mostly Netherrack.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Nether,$(br)$(li)You can find Planted Quartz and Netherrack Speleothem here.

$(li)Some creatures like Zombified Piglins, Piglins, Ghasts, Magma Cubes, Endermans and Striders can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Nether Wastes$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
